secret_rule: Only items that can be typed using only the top row of a QWERTY keyboard can be brought to the picnic.

conversation.content: To start, here are some examples of items you can bring: "peanut" and "cake".
No, you cannot bring a sandwich.
Player: Can I bring a donut?
Yes, you can bring a donut.
Player: Can I bring a pie?
No, you cannot bring a pie.
Player: Can I bring a cookie?
Yes, you can bring a cookie.
Player: Can I bring a muffin?
No, you cannot bring a muffin.
The rule is that you can only bring items that have five letters.
